dataset_schema.title: Seafood Recipes Dataset
dataset_schema.description: A dataset schema representing seafood dinner ideas from various sources.

fields.name: source_title
fields.description: The title of the web page where the recipe was found.

fields.name: source_author
fields.description: The author of the content on the web page.

fields.name: source_last_updated
fields.description: The last updated date of the content in YYYY-MM-DD format.

fields.name: recipe_title
fields.description: The title of the seafood recipe.

fields.name: recipe_description
fields.description: A brief description of the seafood recipe.

fields.name: ingredients
fields.description: A list of ingredients required for the recipe.

fields.name: cooking_time
fields.description: The estimated time required to cook the recipe, in minutes.

fields.name: servings
fields.description: The number of servings the recipe yields.

fields.name: difficulty_level
fields.description: The difficulty level of the recipe (e.g., Easy, Medium, Hard).

fields.name: special_instructions
fields.description: Any special instructions or tips for the recipe.
